question: I went to my Doctor the other day .I was complaining about dry mouth at night.He sent me down for some lab work.Well his nurse called and told me ,I did not have diabetes ,my liver enzimes were normal(which  I was glad to hear .I just finished my hep c treatment in mid december).But she said they wanted to put me on chloresterol lowering medicine.I told her no way, that i used to be on some but my gastrologist took me off of it when he found out I had hep c. Any thoughts on this?
title: hep C
